basics.name: Alexander Paul Wansiedler
basics.label: Senior Full Stack/Web3/DevOps Software Engineer
basics.summary:
Accomplished and results-driven Senior Web3/Full-Stack Engineer with over 20 years of experience in software engineering, DevOps, and system architecture across industries, including web3, digital media, finance, and IoT. Skilled in designing and implementing robust architectures and scalable CI/CD pipelines, with a strong agile focus on big data, zero-party data collection, user-friendly frontends, and high-performance backends.
Experienced mentor in TypeScript, Python, and Rust, architecture, SOLID, and agile principles.

work.name: Ippen Digital Media GmbH
work.summary: Lead development for zero-party data collection and big data applications, building scalable microservices, enhancing data pipelines, and integrating frontend frameworks.
highlights: Architected and implemented a scalable elastic microservices-based backend and frontend system for the zero-party data collection platform from scratch, leveraging Rust/Warp, transitioning Django to FastAPI/SQLAlchemy, and Node.js with Express/Sequelize to Fastify/Prisma.
Utilized ElasticSearch, S3, Apache Kafka, PostgreSQL, and Redis for optimized backend solutions.
Designed and managed Kubernetes clusters on AWS ensuring high availability, security, and scalability.
Developed CI/CD pipelines with GitLab CI/CD, Docker, and Kubernetes, automating application deployments optimized for agile workflow.
Monitored systems with Prometheus and Grafana.
Integrated ArgoCD to streamline GitOps workflows, ensuring seamless application lifecycle management within Kanban.
Built and optimized frontend applications using TypeScript with React, React Query, Next.js, Material UI, and Chakra UI.
Integrated Preact/Vite, Solid.js, TDD (Jest, Loki, Cypress, Playwright), and Redux with sagas for state management.

work.name: Lexx Software Co. Ltd.
work.position: Senior Full Stack Software Engineer / DevOps
work.summary: Developed and managed a high-concurrency crypto-trading platform supporting thousands of assets.
highlights: Architected a trading terminal managing thousands of cryptocurrency assets, ensuring high concurrency and resilience.
Managed cloud infrastructure using Docker Swarm and Kubernetes, ensuring robust deployments.
Automated workflows using Python and Bash, aligned with GitOps principles.
Designed backend architecture using Golang, Node.js, PostgreSQL, and Redis within Docker/Docker Swarm environments.
Led frontend team with TypeScript and Angular (NgRx), transitioning to Vue.js/Nuxt.js and Vuex to Pinia for state management.

work.name: esaveRus Ltd.
work.summary: Led the integration of Swiss IoT street lighting systems in Russia, managing cross-functional teams and technical documentation.
highlights: Oversaw hardware/software integration and deployment processes
Managed server infrastructure and developed backend systems for IoT street lighting systems
Coordinated cross-functional teams and produced technical documentation

work.name: Intaro Software
work.summary: Developed e-commerce platforms and backend systems, including major projects for the Russian market.
highlights: Delivered dozens (sotmarket.ru, ozon.ru etc.) of Symfony/Django and jQuery/extjs based projects with e-commerce/ERC/CRM functionalities
Developed PostgreSQL module, improving data retrieval speeds by over 70%

education.summary: Specialization in Electronics and Automation of Physical Facilities

skills.name: Frontend Development
keywords: TypeScript in React (TanStack Query/SWR, Chakra UI, Material-UI, shadcn)
